    Leadership & Service

    Leadership Development & Training

    Leadership Training Certificate (LTC) 2025 Cohort

    UCSB Adventure Programs | 2025

    • Completing comprehensive outdoor leadership training program through UCSB Recreation
    • Developing skills in group facilitation, risk management, and team leadership
    • Building competencies in outdoor education and experiential learning methodologies [Program Info]

    UR2PhD Graduate Mentor Training

    NSF-funded National Mentorship Program | 2024 - Present

    • Completing certification in evidence-based mentoring practices for underrepresented students in computing
    • Trained in graduate school application support, research mentorship, and career development
    • Participating in structured mentorship curriculum spanning undergraduate research training to PhD preparation [Program Info]

    Academic Leadership & Service

    APS Career Mentor Fellow

    American Physical Society | 2024 - 2025

    • Mentoring 20+ students annually in STEM career development and quantitative fields
    • Providing guidance on career transitions, graduate school applications, and professional development
    • Leading career development workshops and networking events

    Peer Reviewer

    Journal of Computational Physics (Elsevier) | 2025 - Present

    • Evaluate manuscripts on numerical methods for PDEs, spectral methods, and computational physics
    • Provide constructive feedback to advance the field of scientific computing
    • Maintain high standards for scientific rigor and reproducibility

    Community Leadership

    Graduate Hiking & Movement Club President

    UC Santa Barbara | 2025 - Present

    • Lead 100+ member wellness community for graduate students
    • Organize weekly hikes and outdoor activities to promote work-life balance
    • Plan routes, manage safety protocols, and foster inclusive community
    • Build interdisciplinary connections among graduate researchers

    Women* In Science & Engineering Mentor

    UC Santa Barbara | 2023 - Present

    • Guide undergraduate STEM students in academic and career development
    • Provide mentorship on research opportunities and graduate school applications
    • Support women in computational sciences and engineering through one-on-one advising
    • Host workshops on navigating graduate school and research careers

    Undergraduate Research Mentorship
